directions: Bring vegetable stock and water to a boil in a saucepan over high heat. Stir in garlic and soy bean paste, stirring until the paste dissolves. Stir in the green onion, zucchini, tofu, and jalapeno. Allow soup to return to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes.
ingredients: 1 zucchini, halved and cut into 1/2-inch slices
1/2 (16 ounce) package firm tofu, drained and cubed
title: Quick and Simple Korean Doenjang Chigae (Bean Paste/Tofu Soup)
